message: Alright everyone, let's try to keep this first round focused and avoid unnecessary theatrics. Rather than jump into drama, I prefer measured moves and building trust gradually. I'm open to conversation and seeing genuine, thoughtful plans emerge as we progress. Best of luck to all; may the most strategic alliance win!
